name: Node Hexagon Tile Map Generator
tagline: Generates a Hex Tile Map from a png
body:
# Node Hex Tile Map Generator by Box It Off
####Uses https://github.com/jjmax75/node-image-terrain-array to generate input values from a PNG image

**Input** - array of average hsv values for each hexagon, array of centre points of hexagons, hexagon radius

**Output** - Page with SVG of map terrain

## Example

Start with this

![Physical map of part of the world](https://github.com/jjmax75/node-hexmap-generator/blob/gh-pages/images/map.png)

Turn it into this -

[{ h: 91, s: 55, v: 21 }, {....}, .....], [[ 9.804061174918171, 16.9811320754717 ], [ ....... ], ......], 11.320754716981131

And then into this -

![Page with SVG representation of map using Hexagon grid](https://github.com/jjmax75/node-hexmap-generator/blob/gh-pages/images/example-output.png)

## Demo
<iframe width="420" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oXx29H_yG3I" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

## Usage
browser interface
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
